name: eXtreme MotoCross Free
description:
Become the best rider of the world in this new Freestyle Motocross game!

Do as many tricks you want or dare, but beware of the crash!

Share your score on the Internet with your friends and challenge the rest of the world.

★★★ Game Features ★★★

• Many tricks to do, Cancan, Double Cancan, LazyBoy, NacNac Whip, etc.
• 3D Graphics and Animations for realistic jumps and tricks
• Original music and fun sound environment
• Unique Game Experience
• Extremely addictive
